articles.author: CNN
articles.title: Emergency declared in Kazakhstan as fuel protests rage and government resigns - 9News
articles.description: Unrest broke out in cities across Kazakhstan on Wednesday, as thousands angrily protested a sharp fuel price hike that sparked the resignation of the Central Asian country's government.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Hong Kong bans flights as Omicron surges around globe - New Straits Times
articles.description: HONG KONG: Asian financial hub Hong Kong banned flights from eight nations on Wednesday as part of strict new virus curbs, with Omicron outbreaks spiralling out of control from Europe to the United States.
